name: Doctor 0

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: *Wait. If what you're theorizing is this Lobotomite{emph}understands us... can{emph}reason with us...*

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03Dialogue0BigMTRandom
topics.response_text: *{2D Announcement}Attention: Big MT. There is a 95% chance of clear skies interrupted with artillery fire.*

topics.topic_text: You're Doctor O, correct?
topics.response_text: *O? O yes, I'm not going to bother correcting you. At least you got the "Doctor" part correct. I can be grateful for that, at l...*

topics.topic_text: I think you mean "impossible."
topics.response_text: *O really. Now the Lobotomite is master of the dictionary arts. What, do you have a doctorate in verbology? No? I do. And...*

topics.topic_text: I wanted to talk to you.
topics.response_text: *Congratulations, you've succeeded. What, you come to humiliate me, tell me how I've yet to find a means of stopping Mobius' scorpions?*

topics.topic_text: What, my Pip-Boy?
topics.response_text: *How dare you bring RobCo tech in here! What, are you showing off? How great Robert House and his biiiig company are?*

topics.topic_text: Agenda? I don't have any agenda, not with RobCo, anyway.
topics.response_text: *Ooohh, really? You have their tech. On. Your. Arm.*

topics.topic_text: Calm down. Just wanted to ask some questions.
topics.response_text: *Fine. Ask.*

topics.topic_text: What do you do here?
topics.response_text: *All things robotical. You see a robot, I made it. See a broken robot, I made it that way. Deconstructed it down to parts.*

topics.topic_text: Do you have another name?
topics.response_text: *Yeah, I do. It wasn't always "O." I had took that one by default because sometimes it's easier to accept the mistake as long as the purpose works.*

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Mobius and these monsters of his.
topics.response_text: {Grumbled}*That "genius" Mobius somehow cobbled together these really impressive-looking robot scorpions with spare parts. Even painted them.*

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me about this facility?
topics.response_text: *Big{Mountain}MT used to be a mountain. Then there was a... slight mishap. Now it's a crater - the Dome used to be buried, now it's exposed to the sky.*

topics.topic_text: I heard you and 8 were attacked by previous visitors.
topics.response_text: *I don't like to talk about it. 8... he can't talk about it, they fried his voice module something good.*

topics.topic_text: A Giant Robot Scorpion?
topics.response_text: *Yeah, crazy right? Something right out of a Midnight Science Fiction Feature. Ridiculous. What are the odds?*

topics.topic_text: That doesn't sound impressive - breaking machines, that is.
topics.response_text: *Who asked you? You just wait until a working machine threatens you, and you'll wish I was around!*

topics.topic_text: Tell me what happened.
topics.response_text: *This human... I can't believe it... he broke out of the Think Tank. In seconds.*

topics.topic_text: Who were the others?
topics.response_text: *Two other human specimens. One arrived not long after the troublemaker... and the last one, not sure when he showed up.*

topics.topic_text: Why is that?
topics.response_text: *Klein knows things we don't. And I think he told some of those things to the last visitor. Dangerous things if they ever got out.*

topics.topic_text: Are you sure? I'm a good listener. Got the ears for it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] *Great. Psychology. Clearly the worst of the Sciences, right after Colosto-Diarrhetics.*

topics.topic_text: If they kept confusing the letter with a number, your name is Dr. 0... Dr. Zero?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] *Yes! Thank you.{Emph}Zero. I am Zero. How hard is that? A narrow, thin Zero.*

topics.topic_text: I don't know. "O" sounds more impressive.
topics.response_text: *Zero's my name. I'm proud of it, all right? It doesn't get the recognition it deserves.*

topics.topic_text: If you wanted to differentiate the "0" and "O," just put a slash through the zero.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Not sure he heard the player right}*What?*

topics.topic_text: Zero. Draw a slash through it.
topics.response_text: *Did... did I shoot myself with a brainial beam or something? That's brilliant! I mean, I would have come to the same conclusion.{"Eventually..."}Eventually...*

topics.topic_text: So... "O," got any amazing discoveries to share?
topics.response_text: *{Pleased}O, do I?{Listening to how it sounds}Hmmm... O-Do-I... sounds like a song lyric.*

topics.topic_text: I want to talk to you about your name.
topics.response_text: *What about it? I don't feel like arguing it with you, too.*

topics.topic_text: And that's what makes you truly a zero.
topics.response_text: *Exactly. At least the old name was indisputable. O...{frowns}is more like surprise. "O, look what I stepped in!"*

topics.topic_text: So... "Zero," got any amazing discoveries to share?
topics.response_text: *{Pleased}You know, hearing my name said like that... it really de-rezes my screens.*

topics.topic_text: Or you may want to stick with "O." As in, the "Oh!" of discovery.
topics.response_text: *Are you chemming on Mentats right now? "O" of discovery, my reflective posterior...*

topics.topic_text: Well, there's power in zero. It reduces anything multiplied against it - to zero.
topics.response_text: *Well, of course it does. That's the most lethal of mathematics...*

topics.topic_text: Maybe you should dispense with the names and focus on the accomplishments.
topics.response_text: *{Irritated, dismissive}What did accomplishments ever do for us? Please.*

topics.topic_text: I have no idea how you incompetents survived this long.
topics.response_text: *We're smart. Smarter than we give ourselves credit for. I was smart enough to talk to you, give you a chance - and now look what happened!*

topics.topic_text: Well, there's power in zero. It reduces anything multiplied against it - to zero.
topics.response_text: *{DUPE}Well, of course it does. That's the most lethal of mathematics...*

topics.topic_text: < Storage Node. Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: *As for discoveries... well... of course. Look at this! Just... uh... built it. Amazing, isn't it?*

topics.topic_text: It looks like junk.
topics.response_text: *It's a{emph}discovery, kilomiles beyond your understanding, that...*

topics.topic_text: It certainly is... interesting. Whatever it once was.
topics.response_text: *You know what, I'm not even going to pretend. I broke one of the monitors, and those innards start falling out everywhere.*

topics.topic_text: I'm going to need something to debug the Central Intelligence barter routines.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] *Sure... let's see. What could we feed that stupid personality chip...*

topics.topic_text: I need more of those worthless caps to test the CIU barter functions upstairs.
topics.response_text: *Might have a few left. Let me check...*

topics.topic_text: Well, you don't need to worry about Mr. House anymore.
topics.response_text: *{Emph, petulant, defensive}Worry about House? Why would I do that?{To himself}Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*

topics.topic_text: I don't think I'll worry you by telling you what House and his robots have been up to since.
topics.response_text: *{DUPE: Emph, petulant, defensive}Worry about House? Why would I do that?{To himself}Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*

topics.topic_text: How much surgery did you do on me? I feel like a badly-put-together jigsaw puzzle.
topics.response_text: *{Scoffs}Spine.{Irritated}Totally overrated, that arrangement of vertebrae.*

topics.topic_text: Pylons? What pylons?
topics.response_text: *If you get near it, your vision will blur as the electrodes in your head shut off one by one, click click click.*

topics.topic_text: Uh... thanks.
topics.response_text: *Careful where you're pointing that. That device wasn't always a weapon. It was more like a force field kind of thing... once.*

topics.topic_text: You removed my brain?
topics.response_text: *Yeah, 8, no need to brag. Wherever your brain is, it's transmitting thoughts to you through the... what... the, um... uh...*

topics.topic_text: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
topics.response_text: *Klein, um - are you sure we've calculated all the combat probabilities here? I mean, the Lobotomite confronted{emph}Mobius...*

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: *What are we going to do? There's no way we can breach the Forbidden Zone. There's those robot scorpions everywhere!*

topics.topic_text: No, I'm not going to help you.
topics.response_text: *Yes, Dr. Klein? What?*

topics.topic_text: I'll help. What do you need me to do?
topics.response_text: *Agreed.{Tries to interject with his contribution, but he really hasn't contributed anything}O, and I've used my robotical knowledge to um... eh... transmit the... radio map waves to...*

topics.topic_text: No? Why not?
topics.response_text: *It's kind of embarrassing. You have hands. And... uh, a heartbeat, sort of. And eyes. Mostly the hands. There's door handles, and lockers, and...*

topics.topic_text: The faster I can get through this, the better.
topics.response_text: *Right you are, 8. In our test results, we'll make a note about how quickly you ran our maz... er, exper... Nobel... challenge.*

topics.topic_text: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
topics.response_text: *{We don't come over to your house and "f" your wife}Yeah, we don't come into your lab and decant{emph}your solutions.*

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Gun Branch/Skill Check Storage - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: *{Realization}O... I think it wants a combustion pistol.*

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Sonic Emitter Node Storage - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: *{Slightly hesitant to interrupt}O... Doctor Klein... Doctor Klein? If I may{intentional}intersect for a moment.*

topics.topic_text: If you have the gun already, I don't understand what you need.
topics.response_text: *O really, Borous? All{emph}you did in High School was Commie fink-tattle-tale on all the kids you hated, you little teacher's pet brown-hound.*

topics.topic_text: So just plug it into the circular map-thing in the Sink upstairs?
topics.response_text: *Uh, if you're done, can we move again? My biogel's starting to{cramp + coagulate}crampagulate.*

topics.topic_text: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
topics.response_text: {Muttering}*We could give it Mobius' old room. It's where its brain got scooped out anyway, and plus, some of its parts are already there.*

topics.topic_text: This can only work on fields here in the crater?
topics.response_text: *Yeah, we lost that part of the schematics.{Grumbling}Or Borous did. In one of his stupid labs - or inside one of his stupid pets.*

topics.topic_text: You took out my brain, heart, and spine?
topics.response_text: *After that, the brain lost itself -{quieter, confidentially}not in the metaphysical sense.{Shrugs}Might have gotten flushed into one of the pipes.{Thinking}Actually, that's pretty likely.*

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideFlag04
topics.response_text: {Narration}Science is a long, steady progression into the{emph}future. What may seem a sudden event often isn't felt for years, even centuries, to come.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideFlag07
topics.response_text: {Narration}{Bad Karma}It became a reality, a withering form of nostalgia for times long past.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideX13
topics.response_text: {Narration}{X-13 not repeated}The infiltration program in X-13 continued to scan for the subject and the Stealth Suit prototype long after the test was over.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown03
topics.response_text: *Mobius?! Uh, three as in we, as in we are in trouble. That didn't rhyme.*{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown05
topics.response_text: *Five by five...{pauses}someone's coming in live...*{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown10
topics.response_text: *Ten? Borous... why the hell did you install an atomic core?! It'll blow when we reach "one," right?*{2D}

conversation.response_text: *Stop hovering. I mean, if you want.*

combat.response_text: *That wasn't very nice, bullying me like that.*
*{Sarcastic}Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
*I am{emph}so going to attack this target with my weapons.*
*{Dying, gel is running out of body}O... My name... was Dr. Zero... Not O. Zero.*
*My self-preservation routine is circumventing my aggression protocols!*

description:
Doctor 0 is a 65 year-old Human Male.

A pre-War scientist whose brain was transferred into a robotic Think Tank shell after the Great War. Doctor 0 specializes in robotics and is known for his sharp, often sarcastic demeanor. Despite his preference to be addressed as 'Doctor Zero,' he has long since given up correcting others who pronounce his name as 'Doctor Oh.' He receives little respect from his fellow Think Tank members, particularly Klein and Borous.

Doctor 0's Personality: Snarky, intelligent, and perpetually frustrated. Doctor 0 compensates for his lack of respect within the Think Tank with a sharp tongue and condescending attitude. He is highly knowledgeable about robotics but often dismissive of others' intellectual capabilities. Beneath his unpleasant exterior lies a scientist deeply committed to his work, though he rarely shows vulnerability.

Doctor 0's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Doctor 0 rose to become an executive at Big MT Research and Development Center, where he specialized in robotics. When the bombs fell in 2077, he and his fellow executives underwent a procedure to extract their brains and place them in robotic Think Tank shells, allowing them to continue their work in the post-apocalyptic world. Over the decades, Doctor 0 has grown increasingly resentful of his colleagues' disrespect toward him, especially their persistent mispronunciation of his name. Despite his frustration, he remains dedicated to his scientific pursuits, viewing his work as the only thing that gives his existence meaning.
